data.title: St George's Singers Present Music for Passiontide

data.text:
St George’s Singers Present Music for Passiontide on Saturday 23rd March at Holy Name Church, Oxford Road, Manchester M13 9PG.

As we enter Holy Week, a time of penitential reflection in preparation for the dramatic events of Easter, this concert presents some of the greatest choral works inspired by Christ’s suffering.

JS Bach: Cantata No 4

JS Bach: Jesu, meine Freude

WF Bach: Orchestral Suite in G minor

Messiaen: O Sacrum Convivium

Poulenc: Four Penitential Motets

Sanders: The Reproaches

Tickets: £16 and £10 for students/children

Coach transport available from Poynton/Hazel Grove £8
